ruling: - You can Special Summon an "Elemental Hero" monster that was destroyed by battle on a previous turn.
- Activating this card's effect starts a Chain.
- This effect targets the monster to be Special Summoned.

- If an "Elemental Hero" monster is destroyed by battle and removed from play, then returned to your Graveyard by the effect of [[Burial from a Different Dimension]], etc., you cannot Special Summon it with [[Skyscraper 2 - Hero City]].
- Only the controller of [[Skyscraper 2 - Hero City]] can activate its effect.
